mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_class_name, class_name, access_flags, type, seq, exists_downward_classes, upward_simple_class_name, upward_class_name from lv_invoke_extends_impl where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_extends_impl(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_class_name, class_name, access_flags, type, seq, exists_downward_classes, upward_simple_class_name, upward_class_name) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{simpleClassName}, #{classNameDo}, #{accessFlags}, #{type}, #{seq}, #{existsDownwardClasses}, #{upwardSimpleClassName}, #{upwardClassName})

insert into lv_invoke_extends_impl(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_class_name, class_name, access_flags, type, seq, exists_downward_classes, upward_simple_class_name, upward_class_name) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.classNameDo}, #{entity.accessFlags}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.seq}, #{entity.existsDownwardClasses}, #{entity.upwardSimpleClassName}, #{entity.upwardClassName})

insert into lv_invoke_extends_impl(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, simple_class_name, class_name, access_flags, type, seq, exists_downward_classes, upward_simple_class_name, upward_class_name) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.classNameDo}, #{entity.accessFlags}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.seq}, #{entity.existsDownwardClasses}, #{entity.upwardSimpleClassName}, #{entity.upwardClassName})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), simple_class_name = values(simple_class_name), class_name = values(class_name), access_flags = values(access_flags), type = values(type), seq = values(seq), exists_downward_classes = values(exists_downward_classes), upward_simple_class_name = values(upward_simple_class_name), upward_class_name = values(upward_class_name)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_extends_impl
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
simple_class_name = #{simpleClassName},
class_name = #{classNameDo},
access_flags = #{accessFlags},
type = #{type},
seq = #{seq},
exists_downward_classes = #{existsDownwardClasses},
upward_simple_class_name = #{upwardSimpleClassName},
upward_class_name = #{upwardClassName},
where id = #{id}
